sentences.en: Combining knowledge of materials science with extensive numismatic experience, they strive to the fullest extent possible to return your coin to its original appearance.
sentences.cn: 结合材料科学的知识和大量钱币知识，他们尽最大努力以还原你的硬币到原本的外观。

sentences.en: I support the objectives of The China Association of Numismatic and wish to become a member.
sentences.cn: 我自愿加入中国民俗钱币学会,遵守学会章程,履行会员义务.

sentences.en: Our host was Mr. Zhou Xiang, who is head of the numismatic department of the museum .
sentences.cn: 接待我们的是周祥先生，周先生是博物馆钱币部门的负责人。

trans.tran_cn: 钱币的，奖章的，与钱币或奖章有关的
